items.title: オプト、RTB House Japan主催「Top Agency Award」において3期連続「Silver」を受賞
items.summary: Opt Inc. received the 'Silver' award for the third consecutive time at the Top Agency Award hosted by RTB House Japan.

items.title: AI CROSS、福岡商工会議所の「YOKA-DIGI」パートナー企業に認定
items.summary: AI CROSS has been certified as a partner company of YOKA-DIGI by the Fukuoka Chamber of Commerce. This partnership aims to promote collaboration and innovation in the field of AI technology.

items.title: Samsung delays HBM4 rollout to 2026 due to yield challenges, all while SK Hynix strengthens lead in AI memory
items.summary: Samsung delays HBM4 rollout to 2026 due to yield challenges, while SK Hynix strengthens lead in AI memory.

items.summary: gllm-inference-binary 0.4.30 is a library for model inferences in Gen AI applications.

items.title: Golden visas are shrinking for crypto investors
items.summary: Golden visas for crypto investors are decreasing, limiting their options for residency and tax benefits.

items.title: Lightyear eyes AI opportunity on $28 million fund raise
items.summary: Lightyear has raised $23 million in Series B funding to explore opportunities in bringing artificial intelligence to its platform.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7's Now Bar May Soon Support Up to 35 Apps
items.summary: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 may soon support up to 35 apps on its Galaxy AI-powered Now Bar, with new features enabled by the Android 16-based One UI 8 firmware.

items.title: First half of 2025: Solid growth, investments and pipeline progress pave the way for two key launches in H2
items.summary: First half of 2025: Solid growth, investments and pipeline progress pave the way for two key launches in H2 - Group net sales grow by 6.3%* to EUR 14.0 billion, driven by Human Pharma and Animal Health Regulatory submissions underway for zongertinib and nerandomilast, with launches expected in H2 2025 Strategic investments in R&D.

items.title: Google just spent $14 billion on servers in 91 days, plans even higher spending soon
items.summary: Google has increased its capex budget to $85 billion this year, with plans for even higher spending in 2026. The investment is driven by the growth in AI technology, which is creating a new generation of Google-eyed youth.

items.title: Proposal: Responsible AI workflow for creating new documentation for WordPress 6.9
items.summary: Proposal for responsible AI workflow to create new documentation for WordPress 6.9 to improve contributor experience and efficiency.

items.title: How Google and OpenAI’s AI Models Won Gold at the 2025 Math Olympiad
items.summary: At the 2025 International Mathematical Olympiad, Google's DeepMind Gemini and OpenAI's language model won gold, showcasing the advancements of AI in solving complex mathematical problems.

items.title: Comparing Pony AI (NASDAQ:PONY) and GATX (NYSE:GATX)
items.summary: A comparison between Pony AI and GATX as mid-cap transportation companies based on profitability and analyst recommendations.

items.summary: The AI computing optimization framework YICA-Mirage has been added to PyPI, designed for in-memory computing architecture.

items.title: ola-mem0ai 0.1.96
items.summary: ola-mem0ai 0.1.96 introduces long-term memory capabilities for AI agents, enabling them to retain and recall information over extended periods of time.

items.title: Fungi, Carbon, And The Climate Risk Map We Missed
items.summary: Soil fungi store 13 billion tons of CO₂ annually, yet remain ignored in climate risk models. New global maps reveal why fungi are key to ESG, resilience, and restoration.

items.title: ‘America’s AI Action Plan’ may spell trouble for the creative industries
items.summary: 'America’s AI Action Plan' may impact the creative industries by focusing on dismantling regulatory barriers, without mentioning copyright specifically.

items.title: Tesla’s Nightmare Continues As Musk Warns of “Rough Quarters”Ahead
items.summary: Tesla reported a significant decrease in profits and revenue due to factors like weakening demand for EVs and disappearing tax credits. Musk warns of challenging quarters ahead for the company.

items.title: Nokia sees stronger second half after second-quarter miss
items.summary: Nokia's CEO predicts a stronger second half in 2025, following a profit warning due to a weaker US dollar and tariffs.

items.title: (PR) SK hynix Announces 2Q25 Financial Results
items.summary: SK hynix Inc. announced its financial results for the second quarter of 2025, reporting revenues of 22.232 trillion won, operating profit of 9.2129 trillion won, and net profit of 6.9962 trillion won.

items.title: BE Semiconductor Industries N.V. Announces Q2-25 Results
items.summary: BE Semiconductor Industries N.V. reported Q2-25 revenue of €148.1 million and net income of €32.1 million. For the first half of 2025, the company had revenue of €292.2 million and net income of €63.6 million.

items.title: zohencel-ai 0.4.9
items.summary: zohencel-ai 0.4.9 is the world's first 'Text to ML model' support library, which also features an analysis chart bot and a customizable AI voice assistant.

items.summary: Whalecome to Quanzhou: A journey of digital Maritime Silk Road explores the use of AI and digital technologies in enhancing the Maritime Silk Road experience in Quanzhou.

items.title: ‘Hopefully I won’t break anything’: Bill Gates takes on a day in customer service at his daughter’s startup
items.summary: Bill Gates joined the customer service team at his daughter's startup Phia, gaining firsthand experience in understanding user needs and feedback.

items.title: Sam Altman is worried about one kind of tech messing with kids' brains — and it's not AI
items.summary: Sam Altman expresses concern that short video feed dopamine hits may be negatively impacting kids' brain development, not AI.

items.title: (PR) G.Skill Announces T5 Neo Series DDR5-6400 CL38 512GB (64GBx8) Overclocked R-DIMM Memory Kit
items.summary: G.Skill has announced the release of a high-performance DDR5-6400 CL38 512GB memory kit, showcasing advancements in memory technology and performance overclocking.

items.title: Are you a browser or a builder? Why AI’s real disruption demands a different mindset
items.summary: True disruption from AI requires a shift from being a passive browser to an active builder. Businesses need to rebuild from the ground up to truly transform with AI agents as just the starting point.

items.title: Kebab for comfort: After Germany’s DFB-Pokal semi-final exit
items.summary: After Germany’s DFB-Pokal semi-final exit, the DFB women experienced a bitter evening in the European Championship semi-final against Spain. The AI-related news may involve the use of technology for analyzing sports matches, potentially raising ethical questions about the impact of AI on players and teams.

items.title: Reflections from Ooty retreat 2.0
items.summary: Reflections from conducting an AI alignment retreat in Ooty, India to be useful for organizers planning similar events.

items.title: CSB330: Super Kong God Super Kong feat. Gene Park
items.summary: Older Twitch VODs are now being uploaded to a new channel, and a new game feat. Gene Park called Super Kong God is available for mobile download.

items.summary: China plans network to sell surplus computing power in crackdown on data centre glut.

items.title: I tested Samsung's Galaxy Watch 8, and it kickstarted my motivation to get running again
items.summary: The Galaxy Watch 8 is an innovative fitness tracker that kickstarted the user's motivation to get running again, despite some convoluted features. The overall recommendation is positive for most people.

items.title: Google chief says cloud spend is paying off
items.summary: Google's investment in cloud technology, particularly in artificial intelligence, is proving to be lucrative as their public cloud business grows. They are now setting their sights on conquering the new frontier of agentic search.

items.title: Redefining Smart Buildings Through AI and Low-Carbon Innovation
items.summary: Humanity tends to be hesitant towards embracing major transformations immediately, but AI and low-carbon innovation are redefining smart buildings. Similar to past advancements like the Gutenberg press and urban electrification, fears and skepticism are being overcome to make way for progress in office computerization.

items.title: From tech podcasts to policy: Trump's new AI plan leans heavily on Silicon Valley industry ideas
items.summary: Donald Trump reveals new AI strategy focusing on global dominance, cutting regulations, and speeding up AI supercomputer construction.

items.summary: Sam Altman expresses concern that short video feeds could be negatively impacting children's brain development in a significant way, aside from AI.

items.summary: The rise of AI ethics officers is discussed, with a focus on the importance of integrating AI ethics into organizational structure and decision-making processes to build trust and accountability.

items.title: Fixlastmile Releases 2025 Last-Mile Trends Report: Real-Time Tracking Now a Must
items.summary: FixLastMile releases 2025 Last-Mile Trends Report emphasizing the growing need for real-time tracking in delivery systems.

items.summary: Google CEO Sundar Pichai dismisses concerns about AI talent leaving, stating that the company is still doing well in attracting and retaining top talent.

items.title: Crypto Rally Stalls—Correction Ahead For XRP, Solana and Top Altcoins or Just Market Noise?
items.summary: The altcoin rally is cooling as Bitcoin trades sideways, with analysts citing short-term fatigue despite a supportive macro backdrop.

items.summary: China plans to sell surplus computing power from data centers in efforts to regulate the sector after a building boom.

items.title: Synology 2026 Roadmap Plan : New Video Chat App Planned?
items.summary: Synology has revealed plans for a new video chat app as part of its 2026 roadmap, aiming to provide businesses with control over their data while maintaining collaboration, performance, and security. This move challenges the dominance of cloud giants like Google Workspace and Microsoft 365.

items.summary: The article discusses the concept of rotating encryption keys for security and introduces a new tool called AWSKeyLockdown. The author provides an attacker's perspective on the rotation illusion and how it can be exploited.

items.title: A Look At The Fair Value Of HMS Bergbau AG (ETR:HMU)
items.summary: The projected fair value for HMS Bergbau is €79.92 based on 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity with €66.00.

items.title: Alphabet sees net profit rise 19%; says AI Mode ‘going well’ in India and the US
items.summary: Alphabet's net profit rose 19% in Q2, driven by growth in Google Cloud and the impact of AI. AI implementation in India and the US is reported to be successful.

items.title: PayPal to create 100 jobs with AI fraud centre
items.summary: PayPal is creating 100 jobs with an AI fraud center in Ireland, according to The Irish Times business desk.

items.summary: Amazon is paying its latest AI recruits between ₹1.59-2.27 crore annually, with over 11,000 foreign workers onboarded in its recruitment blitz.
